metadata.title: CVE-2017-13735 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a floating point exception in the kodak_radc_load_raw function indcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw 0.18.2. It will lead to a remote denial ofservice attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13735` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.5-1
libraw20 - 0.18.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.5-1').
exactimage package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
dcraw package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
rawtherapee package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
